channel.title: Attacking NPCs?
channel.description: I have a problem on my server. I'm using Project Czar source and when you click on a spell then on an NPC it will cast that spell, whether it's a shop keeper, or whatever. I don't want some NPCs to be attacked. Is there a way to fix this?

item.title: Attacking NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

I’ve seen this happen on loads of servers. Nobody usually does anything aslong as they don’t drop anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @Ganaray Ganaray
item.description:
@Ganaray wrote:

I have a problem on my server. I’m using Project Czar source and when you click on a spell then on an NPC it will cast that spell, whether it’s a shop keeper, or whatever. I don’t want some NPCs to be attacked. Is there a way to fix this?
